Documentation

Annotation Tools

Use drawing, text, mosaic, and step tools to communicate clearly.

Tool categories

Drawing

  • Pencil
  • Marker
  • Arrow
  • Shape (rectangle/ellipse)

Markup and guidance

  • Text
  • Step Badge
  • Emoji Sticker

Privacy and correction

  • Mosaic
  • Eraser

Editing workflow

  1. Draw rough annotations first.
  2. Adjust color and width globally.
  3. Add text and step badges for sequence.
  4. Apply mosaic to sensitive areas.
  5. Use Undo/Redo before export.

Best practices

  • Keep one accent color for key highlights.
  • Use marker for emphasis, not for dense text.
  • Prefer step badges for procedural screenshots.

Export actions

  • Enter to pin result
  • Ctrl/Cmd + C to copy
  • Ctrl/Cmd + S to save

Next step

If you want annotations directly on the desktop, open Screen Canvas.
